channel.title: Llama3 on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Llama3 on Arrans github.io

item.title: Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm
item.description: The all-in-one Desktop & Docker AI application with built-in RAG, AI agents, No-code agent builder, MCP compatibility, and more.

item.title: ollama/ollama
item.description: Get up and running with OpenAI gpt-oss, DeepSeek-R1, Gemma 3 and other models.

item.title: khoj-ai/khoj
item.description: Your AI second brain. Self-hostable. Get answers from the web or your docs. Build custom agents, schedule automations, do deep research. Turn any online or local LLM into your personal, autonomous AI (gpt, claude, gemini, llama, qwen, mistral). Get started - free.

item.title: mudler/LocalAI
item.description: 🤖 The free, Open Source alternative to OpenAI, Claude and others. Self-hosted and local-first. Drop-in replacement for OpenAI, running on consumer-grade hardware. No GPU required. Runs gguf, transformers, diffusers and many more models architectures. Features: Generate Text, Audio, Video, Images, Voice Cloning, Distributed, P2P inference
